name: People-OnTheGo
tag_list: productivity, time-management-tips, email-management, getting-organized, managing-stress, online-courses, virtual-worlds, motivational-speakers, teamwork, document-collaboration, emerging-technology
overview:
People-OnTheGo helps business professionals effectively manage their time, their priorities, and their information architecture, by offering them a comprehensive set of training programs that are available in person and virtually.

People-OnTheGo offerings are based on the breakthrough methodology (named The Accomplishing More With Less Methodology) developed by Pierre Khawand, founder of People-OnTheGo. Mr. Khawand has recently released the methodology in a book available at Amazon.com (The Accomplishing More With Less Workbook) and an eBook available for free download from the People-OnTheGo website (The Results Curve(tm): How to Managing Focused and Collaborative Time).

People-OnTheGo delivers its virtual classes via web conferencing and in Second Life. Web self-paced classes are also available 24x7. Topics covered include time management, e-mail management, office applications, collaboration, and virtual team building.

external_links.title: Interview with Pierre Khawand about Productivity Practices
